meanings.definition: Having or showing stylish excellence or sophistication.
meanings.sent1: She wore the classiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The classiest restaurant in town always has a long waiting list.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to look classiest by sitting on the fancy cushion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the classiest accessory she wore that evening.
meanings.sent5: The classiest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: Of the highest class or quality.
meanings.sent1: This is the classiest car I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The classiest hotels offer top-notch service to their guests.
meanings.sent3: The classiest chocolate in the box disappeared first.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were the classiest way to break the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The classiest diamond sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
